note:
Digital art (mostly 90ies anime style, my comfort) and sometimes (fighting) acrylics.
Trying to improve with low energy (as long as I don't explode like Samus it's fine though, the beep is annoying though).
Queer.
Likes scifi&fantasy (esp DS9, B5 and TNG, Lem&Dick), games. Lately very much into pen&paper let's plays.
Retoots art, flora&fauna, anything interesting to me, or when someones words something way better than I could. Also sometimes social politics (germancentric).
